subject: Concussions
Football
lead_paragraph: Former Jets receiver Wayne Chrebet knows concussions, which is why he urged receiver Laveranues Coles not to play in Sunday’s game against the Redskins.
snippet: Former Jets receiver Wayne Chrebet knows concussions, which is why he urged receiver Laveranues Coles not to play in Sunday’s game against the Redskins.
